CIRCULAR 32 / 2000 
 
 
Subject: Carriage of Arms and Ammunition in the Registered Baggage by 
PSOs of Sh. V.P. Singh, former Prime Minister, while 
accompanying the VVIP during his journey by Air 
 
 
I am directed to convey the approval of the Government to permit PSOs of Shri V.P. Singh, 
former Prime Minister to carry their arms and ammunition in their registered baggage and not 
on person in the Cabin while accompanying the VVIP during his journey by air. 
 
 
 
These instructions will be applicable to all the PSOs of dignitaries of high-risk 
categories who are required to carry their arms and ammunition for performance of duty. 
 
 (P.MOHANAN) 
OFFICER ON SPECIAL DUTY (INT) 
for Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
NO.CAS-8(1) / 96-DIV-I (SPG) 
Dated : 11.10.2000
